name: stocking
content:

C1 one of a pair of tight-fitting coverings for the feet and legs made of thin material and often worn under skirts and dresses: nylon/silk stockings. Compare
nylons old-fashioned
tights
Susan Hanko/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
(also Christmas stocking) a large sock that children leave out when they go to bed the night before Christmas so that it can be filled with presents: On Christmas Eve we hang stockings on the end of our beds. What do you think you'll get in your stocking this Christmas?
traveler1116/E+/GettyImages
